{{ item.id }} {{ item.lastName }} {{ item.firstName }} {{ item.email }}
import {Component, Inject, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from '@angular/common/http'; import {Employee} from "./interface/employee"; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fetch-data.component.css'] }) export class FetchDataComponent implements OnInit { data!: Employee[] | null; selectedItem!: Employee | null; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) {} ngOnInit() { this.loadData(); } loadData() { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'emploee/getAll') .subscribe(data => { this.data = data; }); } addItem() { // Implement logic to add a new item } editItem(item: any) { if (this.selectedItem !== item) { this.selectedItem = item; } else { this.selectedItem = null; } } saveItem(item: any) { // Make PUT request to update the item on the server this.http.put(this.baseUrl + 'emploee/getAll' + item.id, item) .subscribe(() => { this.selectedItem = null; }, error => { console.error('Error updating item:', error); }); } cancelEdit() { this.selectedItem = null; } deleteItem(item: any) { // Implement logic to delete an item } }
